tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cultural_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(255),
  trend_description TEXT,
  trend_start_date DATE,
  trend_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE cultural_trends (
    trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    influence_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE cultural_influences (
    influence_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    influence_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    trend_id INT REFERENCES cultural_trends(trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trend_influences ( 
   influence_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   trend_id INT, 
   influence_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
   influence_type VARCHAR(50), 
   FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES cultural_trends(trend_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE trend_data ( 
   data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   trend_id INT, 
   data_year INT, 
   data_value DECIMAL(10,2), 
   FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES cultural_trends(trend_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE user_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_id INT REFERENCES cultural_trends(trend_id),
    user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE cultural_trends (
    trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_year INT NOT NULL,
    end_year INT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE influencers (
    influencer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    birth_year INT,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    profession VARCHAR(50)
);
